dublin_core.dcvalue: Perle Combary, Acting Project Director, IntraHealth International, Email: pcombary@intrahealth.org
National scale in all 14 regions of Senegal to cover 1,400 service delivery points

The Informed Push Model has successfully improved the supply chain and ensured the steady availability of contraceptive products throughout Senegal, using, among other interventions, a mobile LMIS tool.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:14Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 informed_push_model.pdf: 200215 bytes, checksum: 85bc6791576d10c521f6596e0b34a144 (MD5)
The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, Merck for Mothers

Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Financial transactions and incentives, Provider work planning and scheduling, Sensors and point-of-care diagnostics, Supply chain management, Family planning, Sexual and reproductive health
